summary: Completed comprehensive testing of fashion e-commerce application. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend core functionality working well with minor admin access issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Admin login redirects back to login page instead of accessing /admin route
ui_bugs.details: Admin credentials (admin@atelier.com/admin123) authenticate successfully but /admin route is not accessible

integration_issues.issue: Products take 3-5 seconds to load on homepage and shop page
integration_issues.details: API calls work but there's a delay in rendering products on initial page load

passed_tests: Homepage loading with hero section and navigation
Shop page with product listing and category filtering
Product detail page with size/color selection
User login flow with admin credentials
Cart page displays items correctly when logged in
Product images and information display correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix admin dashboard access issue - admin login succeeds but /admin route redirects back to login page. Check admin role verification and route protection logic.
